reviews.sentence: Perfectly located with friendly staff and great rooms. We had a lovely but short stay in this hotel. Nice and close to the markets and some great food places. The staff were very helpful and friendly and the rooms were large with comfortable beds and pillows. The only noise we heard was in the morning with a child throwing a tantrum outside our door but no traffic noise was audible which is ideal.

TOP service. I was in Saigon on business and NEW WORLD made it very comfortable. The service level is very high and the location of the hotel is perfect. The 10th floor lounge area is perfect for working at night and the staff was very helpful and professional.

Friendly hotel. We started with a smile il smile althe way hotel. Staff areas of each kind and showed a smile. Good and delicious breakfast and clean rooms bathroom amenities are liked. Walking anywhere in the city and good location another wants to visit the hotel again.

Classic Hotel that is Kept Its Class. Stayed here for the weekend got a fabulous deal from Agoda for a 1 bed suite with breakfast. This is a hotel I first stayed in over 20 years though have only stayed once or twice since. Though I have seen a few comments about looking worn did not get that impression at all. Corner suite was lovely great views spacious. Everything worked though shower was a bit on the weak side. Took breakfast on both days the cafe is bright and airy with nice views of street going past outside. If I was going to be picky perhaps the spread is not as huge as some of its competitors though the quality was fine. Service was perfect staff come across as friendly and experienced. Location is great yes a few minutes further to Nguyen Hue and Dong Khoi but it is also closer to the Ben Thanh marketdoes not really have a bar other than a few seats in the lounge and a beer tap a little surprising for a hotel of this calibrate though there is the pool. Great gym very large bright and well equipped. Decent sauna and steam room too. Unlike many of the larger hotels there is a decent podium type area near the pool if you had prefer to stroll around without going outside. Pool itself is large with great bar. Typically on pricing New World is usually a touch cheaper than likes of Sheraton and Park Hyat and given how close they are I had probably choose the New World again next time.
Awesome drinks Awesome food Awesome staff Awesome experience and nice view ❤ ️.

Great Stay in New World Saigon Hotel. It all started In Dec 2014 I booked 4 suites at your hotel and had a wonderful family vacation thereafter in 2015 and 2016 I kept coming back for my business trips. A great hotel with excellent five service from all staff. this is the reason for coming back to New World Saigon for my each and every trip to HCMC.

Awesome stay. The hotel is very modern and the rooms are spacious. The location makes going around very convenient. Many places of interest are walkable distance. Staff are also very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay at this hotel when i visit Ho Chi Minh City again.

Exceptional services and very friendly staff. Very large hotel with friendly staffs. In the heart of Saigon city. Very close to all shopping malls and Ben Thanh market. Staffs were great with exceptional services and good food in the hotel. But the bathroom need some work. There were mole around the bathtub. Otherwise great girl.
Nice modern hotel and the service staff were exceptional. Great District 1 location.

Low 5 hotel standard. It is not worth to stay in this hotel. I have been in this hotel 3 times since 200. nothing updated same old getting worse mold in washroom curtain ceiling. carpet is old and smelling. Breakfast is average Pho soup congee are cold taken forever to get a cup of Vietnamese style filter coffee. Nice Grand lobby and breatfast area to sit but it can be more personal touch when servicing that make you welcome. Staying at many different hotels so far in Asia. This one is a disappointment eventhough it can be easily improved.

Faded glory and dated decent location but not five stars as promised. The staff at New World Saigon is great very helpful and friendly and just waiting for you to need them. They are great. The hotel however is nothing even close to what we expect from a five star in the US. They are currently renovating it thank goodness and hopefully that will help. The construction noise was loud during the day but thankfully we were out of our rooms for most of that time. The pool is lovely and the polside lounge chairs are some of the most comfortable we have found. The pool staff is very helpful but food took a long time to come and it came in waves so as one person was finishing anothers food came. The beds were very comfortable but the rooms were not especially big the blow dryers could not be used in the bathroom and there were hardly any outlets for charging electronics and nowhere was there a USB port for charging which is what I would expect at a hotel that caters to an international population. The breakfast buffet at the restaurant was excellent and we enjoyed it as part of our hotel package I had recommend it. So in all our stay was average.

Great facility made better with amazing customer service. I could not have asked for a better room or overall facilities. The room was always clean and there were too many restaurants to choose from. The gym was more than adequate the pool was very relaxing etc etc. Even having a barber onsite and a spa means you never have to leave. The proximity to all of the sites and ability to quickly book any tour or get directions brought the services to a whole different level. What topped it all off was the capability and customer centric staff. The bar manager Truong took the time even during peak hours to acclimate me to the city and guide me toward his favorite restaurants which were spot on. Most notable was Olivia who worked in the VIP lounge in customer service. She went way above and beyond to make my stay comfortable and enjoyable. I did not have much of an itinerary but she made sure I knew all of the salient sites cultural history and also added a few places to eat. She was amazing. With service like this I would recommend no other place to stay other than New World.
Horrible service. Staff try their damnest to ignore guests.

Beware executive lounge bookers. I have been coming to this hotel many many times and without an office here in VN have been using the facilities and space and meeting rooms of the executive club level. It has been great. Booking through Agoda as usual there was no mention of extensive renovations going on almost the whole bottom floor seems blocked off and the executive floors 10 and 11 are closed. No outside patio. No large lounge with windows. Instead the temporary executive lounge for the next 2 years is a very hot windowles and dark room with too loud house music and competing TV News screens which seemingly can not be turned down. Makes work impossible. The staff as always are really great but the management would be much better advised to suspend the executive club until 2020 when renovations will end. Sadly after 2 dozen visits I will not come back here again.

A perfect place to stay for a vacation. Good buffet food nice location near to market church restaurants. Rooms are spacious n kept clean. Staff very acomodating n friendly. Will surely get back to New World Hotel.
One of the older hotel in Ho Chi Minh City but still hold it is own. Location is at the center if the city great hotel staffs and service s.

Overpriced and unwelcoming. After spending 13 nights travelling through Vietnam our group decided to splash out and spend our last night at the New World Hotel. From the moment we arrived we were shocked at the obscenely overpriced options. We were offered a breakfast special of 27USD per person. Although the room was spacious and clean the shower was only a hand held over bath one and our sleep was interrupted repeatedly by what sounded like water pipes banging. On checkout they tried to overcharge us on our bar tab too. As we had a late flight we made use of the pool area after check out. Whilst using the pool area we were made to feel extremely unwelcome and were harassed about having food and water from an external source. This was only because we refused to pay the price of a soft stick that was 5 times the normal price. The staff made us feel like second class citizens despite the hotel being happy enough to take our money to pay for a room the night before. If you are happy to pay exorbitant prices for snobby second rate service then the New World is for you.

Thanks New World for great experience. When I first walked into this New World Hotel two weeks ago I did not expect much. Since day one New World friendly staff made me feel like home. I got royal treatment everywhere I go. Their breakfast buffet is the best it has so many items to choose at Park View restaurant. Miss Tú Miss Hà Miss Thanh and the whole Park View servers they went out of their way to take care of all my needs. As coming to my last few days of staying I started missing this place already especially all the New World staff. I hope I have an opportunity to come back here and see you all soon. Thanks again New World.
Good service. The service is good but the room looks old.

the best hotel thank you korean staff. I decided to stay at this hotel for the first time when I traveled alone in Vietnam. I think that was a good choice since I had such a great time there. The pool was nice and all hotel staff was friendly. Even though there was a little noise during the daytime I did n’t feel annoyed because I went on a tour and came back to the hotel room late at night. Unfortunately a pickpocket on a motorcycle snatched my cellphone on the street on the last day of my vacation. I was dumbfounded but the staff here tried to help me a lot so I was very impressed with the hotel and in particular the attentiveness of their Korean staff. It was the worst thing that ’s ever happened when traveling and this almost ruined my dream vacation in Vietnam however I think this trip would still bring back a lot of happy memories after all thanks to the kind and thoughtful hotel staff. If you want to avoid being pickpocketed watch out for bikes and stay away from the edge of the sidewalk. Especially Mr Lee Tae Hon Korean Hotel staff. I really appreciate your consideration and hospitality. If you need any help Mr Lee would be the best go to guy. too Noisy. Was given a room at 2nd floor. too closed from heavy traffic and nearby bar and club. Way too noisy at nightthe hotel is on renovation during the day and noisy at night. Not a great experience despite dedicated staff.

Poor. I have visited a lot of countries and hotels. This was the first time happened in my life your hotel really surprised me I have no idea if it was a good experience or not. In the second day I stayed in your hotel I had a long day meeting that day can you imagine that I m totally exhausted and need to take a deep breath and rest in hotel. When I came back opened the hotel room door I was shocked all towels have n’t changed places were messy and no drinking water thanks for your hotel giving me such experience in my life I ca n’t believe this is the benchmark of a 5 stars hotel service level.

Poor feedback for 5 stars hotel. I had an issue not having hot water in the morning before I have to switch room. Going for the check out I share my issue but it seems that it did n’t catch the attention of the person at the front desk. I would have expected a bit of attention for a five stars hôtel. For the price you pay I think that customers deserve a little bit of attention. Anyway just want to share my thinking about not being a commercial staff. For the rest of course a nice room and very good facilities.

Nice location friendly staff but rooms are agining and small. My wife and I have stayed at the New World Saigon 6 8 times usually after arriving in Ho Chi Minh City on a late night arrival and prior to returning to the United States. Our stays are usually 1 3 nights. Hotel is convenient to shopping restaurants Ben Thanh Market and District 1 attractions. Taxi from the airport takes about 20 30 minutes depending on traffic. Staff are very friendly and courteous. Restaurants serving breakfast buffet downstairs and lunch dinner 2nd floor are good. If you do not have the breakfast buffet included in your room rate you are much better off eating elsewhere as it is VERY expensive. easily the most expensive meal I have eaten in Vietnam the one time we discovered it was not included in with our room rate. Buffet is very good though. Nice selection of Vietnamese and western dishes and attentive staff. The last few times we visited the New World Saigon there was construction underway on the lobby area. It could get quite loud and it can be a bit confusing finding your way to reception business services etc. Although the lobby will soon be new and elegant the rooms are aging and small. By western standards the rooms are equivalent to what you would find in any economy hotel like the Days Inn or lower rate Hilton properties. Rooms are small but beds were comfortable. Room services was good. We frequently have had issues with the bathroom no hot water leaking faucets running toilets etc but these are usually fixed quickly. Although the New World Saigon is a good hotel it is expensive for the quality of the rooms. For that reason we chose to stay elsewhere for our next trip to Vietnam. There are many luxury hotels in HCM CIty providing more luxury acomodations and included meals for a better price.

Above average. i found front staff at the front the 10th executive floor very cold and did nt professionally handle a customer choosing to stay in the Premier floors. when you are not listen to and not do nt take your word its disgusting. as a executive floor guest you already choose to pay a premium price and expect premium service and top quality hospitality which was lacking here. I ve stayed at Reverie Park Sheroton and few other top hotels in Saigon and would rate this as the worst.

Memorable Stay in New World Saigon Hotel. Certainly worthy of 5 star rating. Rooms are clean and well maintained breakfast spread is good and staff are very warm attentive and helpful. I would recommend friends and associates to stay there. Locality is also very convenient and safe to walk around at night. The recent visit is my 3rd time staying in this hotel. Although I have not stayed in any other hotel in Ho Chi Minh city before I would still go back to this hotel during my next visit. Another thing to note is that all the staff are fluent in English and hence communication is not an issue like in some foreign countries such as in Thailand where you will face challenges even communicating with the hotel staff. Overall I give this hotel my best recommendation when you visit Ho Chi Minh City whether for business or for a holiday with your family. Transportation is also not an issue when getting a taxi with the help of the hotel especially when you need to rush to the airport.

Exceptional. A massive thank you to New World staff for what they did for me during my recent stay. I left my laptop in the room and only realised it was missing after checking in at the international airport and clearing customs. I explained my situation to airport personnel but they were not willing to help. Therefore I immediately contacted the staff at New World and they quickly located my laptop and were able to get it to me just in time prior to boarding my flight. The hotel went well beyond expectations.

Nice secure central Quality hotel. Good brunch. Daily tea service. Very good laundry service fast. Food is pricy relative to some of the local restaurants and quick stops. I would stay here again and recommend it to others. Pro tip hit the pool area at night and look over the wall at the back end to watch chaos theory in action in the roundabout behind the hotel.

Not a 5 star Hotel. We stayed here for 5 nights in early January with a 25 and 13 year old. Hotel is well located with lots to see and do in the area around around and close by. Rooms are okay and a reasonable size and relatively modern facilities all worked. Pool area is old and showing it ’s age. Buffet breakfast is average with limited protein choices if you do n’t eat pork. Staff are ok but the biggest issue was the club lounge it ’s just not up to the standard I would expect for this type of hotel staff were less than helpful and every simple request was too hard. to the point I ended up going to the main reception which defeats the purpose of paying the extra for club access would look somewhere else next time.

Pool. Had the opportunity to use the outstanding swimming pool today at the beautiful new world hotel Downtown Saigon. There is a fee to use the pool if you are not staying there but I asked at the front desk and was welcomed. The pool is on the second level above the noise from the street like a private oasis in the middle of the city wow the water and lounge chairs and large umbrellas were great. The staff was very attentive and friendly. Had a great experience here.
